name: Enterprise Mobile

sections.title: Definition
sections.description: Please answer a few basic questions about your project and, as an option, add links to supporting documents in the “Notes” section. If you have any files to upload, you’ll be able to do so later.

subSections.validationError: Please provide a name for your project
subSections.title: Project Name

questions.description: Can you provide a brief summary of the application you’d like to develop?
questions.title: App Summary

questions.validationError: Please let us know the target device
questions.title: App Type
questions.description: What type of application are we developing? Please                           place an X in the Required column for each required app                           type. Please note that each additional app type incurs                           a cost, but that the cost will be detailed and broken                           out in the final project proposal.

options.label: iOS App - An app built for iPhone or iPads
Android App - An app built for mobile phones or tablets running Android.
Hybrid App - An app built using a hybrid framework (ex. Ionic/Cordova/Xamarin) and exported to one or more operating systems (iOS, Android or both).
Mobile Web App - An app that is accessed by using a mobile web browser like Safari or Chrome.

questions.description: Please describe the ideal workflow for the proposed solution.
questions.title: Workflow

questions.description: What are the main business objectives you want to achieve by developing this application?
questions.title: Objectives
Form Factor/Orientation
questions.description: Please place an X in the Required column for each                            form factor/orientation that must be supported.

options.label: Mobile Phone - Portrait
Mobile Phone - Landscape
Tablet Device - Portrait
Tablet Device - Landscape

questions.title: Do you have a style guide or branding guidelines that need to be followed?
Are there any particular fonts you want used?
Are there any particular colors/themes you want used?
Do you need an app icon designed, or will you provide one?

subSections.title: User Roles
subSections.description: Please place an X in the Required column for each user type/role. Please provide details on what the user/role should do in the Description column.

questions.title: Standard User
Admin
Super Admin

subSections.title: Integrations
subSections.description: Will this application be dependant on data from another system or tool? If yes, please briefly describe that dependency here.  This can include integration with an API or an existing backend/database.

questions.title: API
Backend
Database
Screen / Feature List
questions.description: Please note that each added feature incurs a cost,                          but that the cost will be detailed and broken out in the                          final project proposal.

options.label: Enterprise Login - Supports integration with an existing authorization/authentication mechanism.
Email Login - Support sign in using an email address/password.
Social Login - Support register and login using third-party services such as Facebook, Twitter, and Google.
Registration - Allow users to register and login using their email address and a password. Users can also change their password or recover a forgotten one.
Invitations - Allow users to invite others to use your app via email.
Introductions - Present your app and inform users of core functionality using a series of introductory screens before they sign up.
Onboarding - Virtually walk your users through your application. This functionality is especially useful if you need new users to set up an account or express preferences after they sign up.

Search - Provide the ability to search your app for specific content, such as products, members, or locations. Please specify below if you also would like autocomplete--suggesting appropriate search terms as a user starts typing.

Location Based Services - App must support the identification of the users geographic location for location based features. Ex. show store locations on a map or illustrating the progress of a delivery.
Camera (Audio & Video) - Add this feature if your app will require using the camera to capture audio or video.
File Upload - Allow users to upload photos or other files.
Notifications - Take advantage of notifications; for example, remind users to do certain tasks or update them on new content.
Dashboard - App must have a central dashboard where users can access functionality
Tagging - Allow users to tag products, people or content; for example, in order to classify and easily retrieve notes.
Account Settings - Allow your users to adjust settings or specify preferences, such as communication frequency.
Help/FAQs - Include a section dedicated to FAQ or Help content.
Marketplace - Allow users to buy, sell, or rent products or services.
Ratings & Reviews - Let users rate or review people, products, or services.
Payments - Allow users to pay in some way; for example, using credit cards, PayPal, or Bitcoin.
Shopping Cart - Allow users to save items before purchasing. Please specify your desired functionality below.
Product Listing - Add this feature to shows lists of product or services, with individual detail pages for each one.
Activity Feed - Show your users an activity feed of some kind, as they’re used to seeing on Facebook and Twitter, for example.
Profiles - Add this feature if your app requires users to have a profile, including the ability to edit it.
Messaging - Allow direct communication between two or more users.
Admin Tool - App must have an administrative tool or panel to enable direct management of users, content and the application.
Social Media Integration - App must integrate with social media providers (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Google+, etc)
Reporting - App must have the ability to report/export data
Contact Us - App must have the ability to allow users to contact an administrator/send feedback to administrators.
3D Touch - If this is an iOS App -- should the designers make use of 3D Touch?

questions.title: Tech Features

options.label: SSO Integration - App must integrate with enterprise single-sign-on capability.
API Integration - App must integrate with a pre-existing API.
Third Party System Integration - App must integrate with an external application or system and either retrieve or post data.
Containerized Code - The codebase must be containerized via Docker to allow for easier deployment and maintenance.
Unit Tests - App must have unit tests to ensure code coverage.
Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment - Establishment of a CI/CD pipeline.
Analytics Implementation - Implementation of analytics to track user behavior and app usage.
Email (SMTP Server) Setup - Development and configuration of an SMTP server to provide email notifications. Design, content and development of the emails will need to be handled separately.
Offline Capability - Ability to use features of the application offline, and have the data persist/saved locally and then sent back to a server for syncing.
Minimal Battery Usage Implementation - Update to the core features of a mobile application to support the ability to minimize usage of network bandwidth and battery usage.
Apple App Store & Google Play Submission Support - Consulting support to help streamline the app publishing process to Apple App Store or Google Play.
SMS Gateway Integration - App must integrate with an external SMS gateway/provider for notifications via SMS.
Error Logging - Does the application need error logging (this will log all errors, exceptions, warnings, debug information during the application execution and will be helpful to rectify the issues)?
Face ID / Touch ID -- If this is an iOS App -- should we support Face ID/Touch ID for login

subSections.title: Technology Stack
subSections.description: Do you have a preferred technology stack? If yes, please list those requirements here:

questions.title: Programming Languages
Frameworks
Database
Server
Hosting Environment
Security Requirements

options.label: Standard Security
Enterprise - if your application will house                   or transmit PII or sensitive data. The data will be encrypted on the device and the server.
Vulnerability Scanning - Scan your application for weaknesses
Audit - Auditing will record user information on actions performed.
System will be working with confidential, health or financial records

questions.description: Please place an X in the Required column for each required security requirement.

questions.title: Quality Assurance, Test Data & Performance Testing
questions.description: Please place an X in the Required column for each required QA requirement.

options.label: Real World Unstructured - Users search on their own for bugs or usability issues.
Structured Functional - execution of predefined test scripts
Test Case Creation - creation of scenarios, instructions and exepected results
Certify your mobile application release against predefined device set including.
Test real devices in real cell networks across the world
Identify and provide perfromance improvements
Testing web application robustness

questions.title: How many users do you intend to support?
Do you intend to supply test data or should Topcoder create it?
User Acceptance / Beta Testing
questions.description: UAT is the process of sharing the final application with users and gathering feedback. Please place an X in the Required column for each required UAT requirement.

options.label: 1 UAT/Beta Test Cycle.
Implementation of Updates (update the app based on UAT/Beta Testing feedback)

questions.description: How much budget do you have? Please place an X in the Confirm column to specify your budget.
questions.title: Budget
questions.validationError: Please provide expected hours of execution

questions.description: When do you need your app by? Please place an X in the Confirm column to specify your timeline.
questions.title: Timeline
questions.validationError: Please provide expected hours of execution

subSections.description: Add any other important information regarding your project (e.g., links to documents or existing applications)

questions.validationError: Please let us know what kind of testing you would like to execute
questions.title: What kind of crowd testing are you interested in?
questions.description: Structured testing focuses on the execution of test cases, whereas unstructured testing lets the testers create their own path through an application as an end user might.

questions.validationError: Please let us know if you have test cases.
questions.title: Do you have test cases written?
questions.description: Do you have test cases you would like executed? These are essential when running structured testing and optional for unstructured testing. If you are planning a structured test cycle and do not have test cases do not worry, we can help!

options.label: Yes I have test cases.
No I do not have test cases.

questions.description: Brief Description
questions.title: Description
Please tell us about your users.
questions.description: Please share information about your end users. Where are they from? What is their goal? This information can help us find the best testers for your application.

questions.title: Which is your primary device target?
questions.description: Select only the device that you need to develop for.                           In most cases limiting the scope of your project would result                           in better final result. Topcoder recommends to always start                           with the mobile phone view and expand to other devices as your                           app matures.

name: Salesforce Accelerator

sections.title: Definition
sections.description: Please answer a few basic questions about your project and, as an option,                  add links to supporting documents in the “Notes” section. If you have any                   files to upload, you’ll be able to do so later.                                    *AssureNXT - Rapid Test Design Module is a Component of AssureNXT which is a Test Management Platform.                  It helps in Automated Test Case and Test Data Model generation through business process diagrams.                  RTD establishes direct relationship between business requirements, process flows and test coverage.                  Accelerated Test Case generation for changed business process.                                    *Tosca - Tricentis Tosca is a testing tool that is used to automate end-to-end testing for software applications.                  Tricentis Tosca combines multiple aspects of software testing (test case design, test automation, test data design                   and generation, and analytics) to test GUIs and APIs from a business perspective
